description:
Let the tart sweetness of sour cherries help power you through your next training session. Not all energy chews are created equally. Skratch set out to make a delicious energy chew that isn’t coated in wax, uses easy to digest natural carbohydrates, and is fun to eat. The result? These ones flavoured with real fruit.

  • Ingredients: tapioca syrup, cane sugar, water, pectin, cherry powder, citric acid, lactic acid, sea salt and green tea extract
  • Natural caffeine from green tea helps add a boost of energy
  • 4g of carbohydrates or 16 calories per drop
  • Made with real fruit flavour
  • Sour sugar coating uses a combination of apple acid (fumaric acid) and crystalized sugar to prevent drops from sticking together
name: Skratch Labs Energy Chews Sour Cherry with Caffeine
